actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage college savings by providing a Federal income tax credit to match contributions to Coverdell education savings accounts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Kick Start to College Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow parents a tax credit for contributions to a qualified higher education subaccount established under a Coverdell education savings account to pay their childrens' higher education expenses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage college savings by providing a Federal income tax credit to match contributions to Coverdell education savings accounts, and for other purposes.
